name: BlasterSpace
description:
Blast alien hordes in a classical space shooter.

Features:

-32x32 retro style textures

-various types of aliens

-animated sprite for each alien

-12 millions of randomized levels

-difficulty increasing dynamically when playing

-and much more fun

Initially based on my clone of Badsector's pascal game, but this game is made entirely of my textures (I hope they aren't that bad)
